testcase.name: When yellow pawns are at start's positionsthen they should be unmovable when dice status doesn'tequal six
When red pawns are at start's positionsthen they should be unmovable when dice status doesn'tequal six
When green pawns are at start's positionsthen they should be unmovable when dice status doesn'tequal six
Pawns should be unmovable before clickingdice button. Only after throwing the dice pawncan be moved
Pawns should be movable in correct orderand should be unmovable when other player/computermoving
Yellow pawns should be moved after clickingat first position of their journey
Red pawns should be moved after clickingat first position of their journey
Green pawns should be moved after clickingat first position of their journey
When blue pawns are at start's positionsthen they should be unmovable when dice status doesn'tequal six
Blue pawns should be moved after clickingat first position of their journey
